title: Murder in the US - number of victims by weapon 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of murder victims for 16 number of Weapon Useds.
Weapon Used Handguns has the highest Number of murder victims and Explosives has the lowest Number of murder victims.
The difference of Number of murder victims between the highest and lowest Weapon Used is 6599.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of murder victims for 16 number of Weapon Useds.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of murder victims for 16 number of Weapon Useds.
Weapon Used Handguns has the highest Number of murder victims and Explosives has the lowest Number of murder victims.
The difference of Number of murder victims between the highest and lowest Weapon Used is 6599.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Weapon Used, and Number of murder victims in each Weapon Used on the y axis.
The Number of murder victims is highest at Weapon Used Handguns and lowest at Weapon Used Explosives.
Weapon Used Firearms type not stated has the second highest value for Number of murder victims.
The difference of Number of murder victims between the highest and lowest Weapon Used is 6599.0.
Number of murder victims at Weapon Used Handguns is 6603.0 , second place is Firearms type not stated at 2963.0, and thirdly is Knives or cutting instruments at 1515.0.
The Weapon Used Explosives tends to be 7.48 percent lower than average.
The Number of murder victims is 14123.0 if we add up values of all Weapon Useds.

data.Weapon Used: Other weapons or weapons not stated
